wiki.text:
'Tenascin C' is a glycoprotein that in humans is encoded by the TNC gene.<ref
name="pmid1704365"></ref><ref name="pmid1707164"></ref> It is expressed in the
extracellular matrix of various tissues during development, disease or injury,
and in restricted neurogenic areas of the central nervous system.<ref
name="Wiese"></ref>
wiki.title: Tenascin%20C
